text: 3.3 Mat 24.43-44, Luk 12.39-40, 1 Te 5.2, 5.6, 1 Ti 6.20, 2 Pi 3.10, Lep 2.5, 16.15 Anɨb ak takaw tep agñelak nɨŋɨd dɨpek ak, taynen kelɨgɨpun agɨl, adɨkɨd tepayaŋ dɨl kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agak. Wɨsɨn kɨl kɨn yenɨgabɨm ak, yad bɨ tap si dep okok nɨg mɨdel ma opal tek ak apen, nɨbi ma nɨgɨnɨgabɨm ñɨn akal ownɨgayn agak.
